document_data.name: Thammar Saddusk
document_data.mainbody: '''Thammar Saddusk''' was a very friendly wine merchant in [[High Dale]].
document_data.History: When in [[1358 DR]] a secret [[Zhent]] occupation army occupied the dale, Saddusk was a member of the [[Council of the High Dale]]. Saddusk was apparently interested only in the good of the dale.
